mapper.select: SELECT USECASE.USE_CASE_ID USE_CASE_ID , REG_DT , TITLE , CONTENT , user.USER_NAME USER_NAME FROM USE_CASE USECASE INNER JOIN USE_CASE_API_LIST UCAL ON USECASE.USE_CASE_ID = UCAL.USE_CASE_ID AND UCAL.API_LIST_ID = #{apilistid} INNER JOIN USER user ON user.USER_ID = USECASE.USER_ID

SELECT USECASE.USE_CASE_ID USE_CASE_ID , REG_DT , TITLE , CONTENT , user.USER_NAME USER_NAME FROM USE_CASE USECASE INNER JOIN USER user ON USECASE.USER_ID = user.USER_ID WHERE USE_CASE_ID = #{usecaseid}

SELECT apilist.API_LIST_ID API_LIST_ID , API_NM , PRV_ORG , API_VIEW , API_RGDT , APIUSES.COUNT_API_USES FROM API_LIST apilist INNER JOIN USE_CASE_API_LIST UCAL ON apilist.API_LIST_ID = UCAL.API_LIST_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT API_LIST_ID , COUNT(*) COUNT_API_USES FROM API_USES GROUP BY API_LIST_ID) APIUSES ON APIUSES.API_LIST_ID = apilist.API_LIST_ID WHERE UCAL.USE_CASE_ID = #{usecaseid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USE_CASE (USE_CASE_ID, REG_DT, TITLE, CONTENT, USER_ID) VALUES (#{usecaseId}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), #{arg2.title}, #{arg2.content}, #{userId})
